Assign bins for downsampling looking data

Assign bins for downsampling looking data

assign_bins(data, bin_width = 3, time_var, ..., bin_col = ".bin",
  na_location = "tail", partial = FALSE)

Arguments

data

a dataframe of looking data
bin_width

the number of items to put in each bin. Default is 3.
time_var

the name of the column representing time
...

grouping variables
bin_col

name of the column to add. Defaults to ".bin".
na_location

Where to assign NA bin numbers. "head" and "tail" respectively put the NA elements at the head and tail of the vector; "split" alternates between "tail" and "head".
partial

whether to exclude values that don't fit evenly into bins. Defaults to FALSE, so that the user is warned if a bin is incomplete.

Value

the original dataframe with an added column of bin numbers. The dataframe will be sorted by the grouping and time variables.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
